title: Bachelorette boys’ boozy weekend
text:
Bachelorette boys reunite for boozy weekend on the South Coast Charlotte Willis news.com.au Bachelorette boys reunite for boozy weekend on the South Coast Charlotte Willis news.com.au Ex-contestant Dave enjoying a few beers with his Bachelorette pals in Nowra. 
WITH the finale of The Bachelorette looming this week, it looks like some of the blokes have been busy letting off a bit of steam. 
Three of this season’s gents, two previously eliminated, one not, were photographed sinking a few beers on the NSW South Coast on Saturday — at 8 o'clock in the morning, as you do. 
Sasha Mielczarek, who is still in the running to win Sam Frost’s heart, was joined by ex- Bachelorette pals Davey Lloyd and Dave Billsborrow during a boys’ weekend away in his hometown. 
Billsborrow, who was sent packing just prior to the home visits last week, even did a “shoey” on the beach after being handed a shoe filled with beer by one of the guys. Dave Billsborrow drinking beer from a dirty shoe. All class, mate. 
At first glance it appears the guys are enjoying someone’s buck’s party, with the trio having a great old time partying up a storm in the small coastal town of Huskisson. But the rendezvous might be nothing more than a shameless publicity stunt to drum up interest in this week’s Bachelorette finale. 
These are the first photos we’ve seen of 30-year-old construction manager Sasha since the show started, with fans speculating that the Bachelorette finalist had gone into hiding to deflect the attention away from himself as the show heats up. Other Stories
